definition: variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
pediatrics/pediatric (department)/sth of little importance/trifle/a child's play/(slang) childish/petty/stingy

sentences.english: For the study, published in the September issue of Pediatrics, researchers identified 28 babies who spent time in the NICU and were later diagnosed with an autism spectrum disorder.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究发表在九月份的《儿科》杂志上面。

sentences.english: If CD31 stains vessels, that is what we expected. We need a pathologist with pediatric pathology background to explain this case.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要有儿科病理知识的病理学者来解释这个病例。

sentences.english: Demonstrate ability to direct pediatric trauma resuscitations.
sentences.chinese: 有能处小儿科创伤的救护。

sentences.english: Objective To explore nurses' techniques in communicating with patients in paediatrics out-patient clinic triage.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨儿科门诊分诊护士沟通的技巧。

sentences.english: We have commissioned a full external investigation being led by an independent paediatric doctor.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经委托其他独立的儿科医生进行全面的调查。
一个萨那儿科医生这么告诉我。

sentences.english: The Subspecialty Group of Respiratory Diseases, The Society of Pediatrics, Chinese Medical Association.
sentences.chinese: 中华医学会儿科学分会呼吸学组。

sentences.english: The Subspecialty Group of Hematology, the Society of Pediatrics, Chinese Medical Association.
sentences.chinese: 中华医学会儿科学分会血液学组。

sentences.english: Most pediatricians recommend starting with an iron-fortified cereal.
sentences.chinese: 大多数儿科医生建议给宝宝喂养含铁的谷物。

sentences.english: Additional resources have also been provided to paediatric health care providers by the Ministry of Health.
sentences.chinese: 卫生部还为儿科医护机构提供了更多资源。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effect of changed ways of second line nurses "on-duty" in pediatric ward.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨改变儿科二线护士值班方式的效果。

sentences.english: The diagnostic pediatrician didn’t look like a doctor.
sentences.chinese: 那个诊断的儿科医生看起来一点都不像医生。

sentences.english: But pediatricians do not consistently prescribe vitamin drops.
sentences.chinese: 但是儿科医生没有自始至终地开出维生素点滴的处方。

sentences.english: The Society of Pediatrics, Chinese Medical Association.
sentences.chinese: 中华医学会儿科学分会心血管学组。

sentences.english: Have you chosen a pediatrician yet?
sentences.chinese: 你已经选好了儿科医师了吗？

sentences.english: Methods: A total of 40 medical personnel in PICU were investigated by random sampling.
sentences.chinese: 随机抽样调查儿科监护室的40名医护人员。

definition: department of gynecology and obstetrics/birth clinic
child victim of disaster or disease/afflicted child
to see a doctor/to seek medical advice
